task.title: Adding Profile Photos
task.shortdesc: Add a personal photo to your profile.

taskbody.context: Your profile picture or Ravatar represents you throughout Ravelry. It appears on your profile page, next to your projects, in your groups: anywhere you are active. Ravatars may not contain nudity, profanity, or hate speech.

step.note: Profile photos must be PNG or JPG format and must be uploaded from your computer.
step.cmd: Click Browse to browse to the photo on your computer.
